product_title: Chuwi GemiBook Plus Intel Celeron N100 15.6 inch Full HD Laptop

detail.name: Chuwi GemiBook Plus Intel Celeron N100 15.6 inch Full HD Laptop

details.description_text: 15.6 inch, 1920*1080P, 16:9 Intel N100, Quad Core Quad Thread, 0.8 to 3.4GHz, 7nm Intel UHD Graphics for 12th Gen Intel Processors 8GB LPDDR5 + 256GB SSD WiFi6 802.11ax & BT5.2 2.0M Front Camera Battery: 38Wh(7.6V/5000mAH), Backup time: 5.5 hours Windows 11 Home; Color: Grey Chuwi GemiBook Plus Intel Celeron N100 15.6 inch Full HD LaptopThe Chuwi GemiBook Plus is a powerful and spacious 15.6-inch Full HD laptop designed to provide an exceptional computing experience. With a 1920 x 1080P resolution and a 16:9 aspect ratio, this laptop provides an immersive visual experience for work, pleasure, and beyond. The Intel Celeron N100 CPU takes center stage under the hood, with a Quad Core Quad Thread arrangement working at clock speeds ranging from 0.8 to 3.4GHz on an efficient 7nm architecture. This assures smooth multitasking and quick performance, which is enhanced with Intel UHD Graphics designed for 12th Gen Intel Processors for clear, detailed images. With its combination of a large 256GB SSD and 8GB of LPDDR5 RAM, the GemiBook Plus offers customers plenty of storage space as well as quick access to data. With WiFi 6 (802.11ax) and Bluetooth 5.2, connectivity is excellent and provides fast wireless connections for a smooth online experience. The laptop's adaptability is increased by the 2.0M front camera, which qualifies it for virtual and video conferences. The laptop has 38Wh battery (7.6V/5000mAh) ensures a dependable backup time of around 5.5 hours, enabling productivity while on the road. It was designed with mobility in mind. The GemiBook Plus, running Windows 11 Home, has a cutting-edge and user-friendly interface that makes use of the newest features and security improvements. In conclusion, the Chuwi GemiBook Plus is a feature-rich laptop that shines in terms of connection, processing speed, display quality, and mobility. For those looking for a complete and effective computing solution, this laptop is a great option.

product_title: ASUS Vivobook Go 15 E1504GA-NJ231 Intel Core i3-N305 8GB RAM 512GB SSD 15.6-inch FHD Laptop

detail.name: ASUS Vivobook Go 15 E1504GA-NJ231 Intel Core i3-N305 8GB RAM 512GB SSD 15.6-inch FHD Laptop

details.description_text: Processor: Intel Core i3-N305 Processor RAM & Storage: 8GB DDR4, 512GB M.2 NVMe PCIe 3.0 SSD Graphics: Intel UHD Graphics Display: 15.6-inch Full HD (1920 x 1080) Certifications: US MIL-STD 810H military-grade standard ASUS Vivobook Go 15 E1504GA-NJ231 Intel Core i3-N305 8GB RAM 512GB SSD 15.6-inch FHD Laptop is powered by an Intel Core i3-N305 Processor, offering efficient performance for everyday tasks. This processor can easily handle common tasks such as web browsing, document editing, and multimedia playback. It comes with 8GB DDR4 onboard. The laptop has a 512GB M.2 NVMe PCIe 3.0 SSD offering ample storage space for your files and documents. The Intel UHD Graphics Card ensures decent graphics performance for basic applications and multimedia. With a 15.6-inch Full HD (1920 x 1080) 16:9 aspect ratio display, the laptop delivers vibrant visuals, a fuller viewing angle, and a wider color range. This display features 250 nits of brightness.For a long time, backup it has a 42WHrs, 3S1P, 3-cell Li-ion battery. You can enjoy your outdoor work or movie time without worrying about plugging the laptop into power. For better wireless connectivity, it has the latest Wi-Fi 6E(802.11ax) (Dual band) 1*1 + Bluetooth 5.3 Wireless Card (*Bluetooth version may change with OS version differences.). This laptop has a Built-in speaker and array microphone that provides a stunning audio experience. It has a variety of ports, including 1x USB 2.0 Type-A (data speed up to 480Mbps), 1x USB 3.2 Gen 1 Type-A (data speed up to 5Gbps), 1x USB 3.2 Gen 1 Type-C (data speed up to 5Gbps), 1x HDMI 1.4, 1x 3.5mm Combo Audio Jack, 1x DC-in.The 720p HD camera with privacy shutter is ideal for video conferences and online classes. ASUS Vivobook Go 15 E1504GA-NJ231 is packed with many special features, such as a backlit chiclet keyboard that helps in low-light areas, and a Trusted Platform Module (Firmware TPM) that provides security against threats like firmware and ransomware attacks. This laptop comes with US MIL-STD 810H military-grade standard certifications. Weighing in at only 1.63 kg (3.59 lbs), this is a lightweight laptop. This makes it very portable and easy to carry around. The Mixed Black of this laptop offers a sleek and stylish look. Box content includes a ø4.5, 45W AC Adapter, a Laptop, and a user manual. For peace of mind, Asus provides a 2-year brand warranty on laptops and a 1-year warranty on power adapters.

Operating System - FreeDOS Security Chip - Trusted Platform Module (Firmware TPM) Security Slot - Kensington Lock x1 Fingerprint - Yes Color - Space Grey Dimension - 314.6 *224.2*15.8mm Weight - 1.39Kg Warranty - 2 Years Service Warranty (Battery & Adapter 1 Year) Gift - Laptop Bag Tecno MEGABOOK T1 14 Core i5 13th Gen LaptopThe Tecno MEGABOOK T1 14 is a sleek and powerful laptop built for smooth performance, everyday productivity, and effortless multitasking. It is powered by the 13th Gen Intel Core i5-13420H processor, featuring 8 cores and 12 threads with speeds up to 4.6GHz. This makes it ideal for students, professionals, and anyone who needs fast and reliable computing on the go. With 16GB of LPDDR4 onboard RAM, the laptop offers seamless multitasking and fast app performance. The 512GB M.2 SSD ensures quick boot times, faster data access, and plenty of storage for documents, media, and software. The 14-inch Full HD display provides a crisp and vibrant viewing experience. It offers a 1920x1200 resolution, 300nits brightness, 100% sRGB color coverage, and a 72% NTSC colour gamut. The anti-glare panel and 90% screen-to-body ratio enhance your viewing comfort whether you're working or watching content. For graphics, the laptop comes with Intel UHD Graphics which handles everyday visuals and light creative tasks efficiently. The white backlit keyboard with four adjustable brightness levels lets you work comfortably in any lighting environment, while the smooth touchpad supports precise control. Connectivity is modern and fast with Wi-Fi 6E and Bluetooth 5.4. You also get a wide range of ports including two USB Type-C ports with charging, data, and display support, one USB 3.1 Gen 2 port, two USB 3.0 ports, and an HDMI 1.4 output. The 2MP webcam makes video calls clear, and the dual microphones ensure crisp audio capture. The Tecno MEGABOOK T1 14 also offers impressive audio with DTS X Ultra technology, dual 2W speakers, and Realtek audio codecs. Its 75Wh battery provides long-lasting power, while the 65W Type-C adapter supports fast charging with Power Delivery. Security features include a fingerprint reader, Firmware TPM, and a Kensington lock slot. The slim and lightweight design in stylish Space Grey, weighing only 1.39kg and measuring just 15.8mm thin, makes it easy to carry wherever you go. Preloaded with FreeDOS, the laptop allows users to install their preferred operating system. It comes with a 2-year warranty, giving you peace of mind and reliable support. The Tecno MEGABOOK T1 14 is a solid all-rounder built for performance, mobility, and modern computing.

details.description_text: Model: Aspire 3 A315-59 Processor: Intel Core i5-1235U (12M Cache, 3.30 GHz, up to 4.40 GHz) RAM: 8GB DDR4, Storage: 512GB SSD Display: 15.6" FHD (1920x1080) TFT LCD Features: Stereo Speaker, Type-C Acer Aspire 3 A315-59 Core i5 12th Gen 15.6" FHD LaptopAcer Aspire 3 A315-59 Laptop comes with Intel Core i5-1235U (12M Cache, 3.30 GHz, up to 4.40 GHz). It comes with 8GB (4GBx2) DDR4 RAM, 512GB PCIe Gen4 SSD, and AMD Radeon dual-core Graphics. The Acer Aspire 3 A315-59 Laptop is also featured with a 15.6" FHD (1920x1080) high-brightness Acer ComfyView LED-backlit TFT LCD Display. The laptop is equipped with an HD webcam and stereo speaker. It runs on Windows 11 Home operating system. For connectivity options, it comes with an RJ45 port, IEEE 802.11a/b/g/n/ac, and Bluetooth 5.0. It has been designed with 1x HDMI, 2x USB 3.2 port, and 1x USB Type-C port with DC-in. The Acer Aspire 3 A315-59 Multi-gesture touchpad, supports two-finger scroll; pinch; gestures to open Cortana, Action Center, multitasking; application commands. It has a 99-/100-/103-key Acer keyboard layout with international language support including indicators of CapsLock and F4/Microphone mute. The laptop is powered by a 40 Wh 3 cell Lithium Ion battery and comes with a 3-pin 45 W AC adapter.
